parts.text: {"word":"oil-derived","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"石油由来の、石油から作られた","english_definition":"Obtained or produced from petroleum (crude oil).","examples":[{"sentence":"Many plastics are oil-derived products.","translation":"多くのプラスチックは石油由来の製品です。"},{"sentence":"The chemical industry relies heavily on oil-derived feedstocks.","translation":"化学産業は石油由来の原料に大きく依存しています。"},{"sentence":"Oil-derived fuels contribute significantly to carbon emissions.","translation":"石油由来の燃料は、炭素排出量に大きく寄与しています。"}],"collocations":["oil-derived plastic (石油由来のプラスチック)","oil-derived fuel (石油由来の燃料)","oil-derived chemical (石油由来の化学物質)","oil-derived product (石油由来の製品)","oil-derived feedstock (石油由来の原料)"],"synonyms":["petroleum-based","petrochemical","fossil fuel-based"],"antonyms":["bio-based","renewable","plant-derived"],"related_terms":["petroleum","crude oil","petrochemicals","fossil fuels","refinery"],"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「oil-derived」は、石油（原油）を起源とする物質や製品を指す形容詞です。環境問題や代替エネルギーに関する議論でよく用いられます。","priority":"★★☆"}],"etymology":{"value":"「oil」（石油）と「derived」（由来する）の組み合わせ。","priority":"★★★"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈɔɪl dɪˌraɪvd/","syllables":"oil-de-rived"},"inflection":{"notes":"形容詞なので、比較級・最上級の変化はありません。"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"中頻度","priority":"★★☆"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The oil-derive product is expensive.","correct":"✓ The oil-derived product is expensive.","note":"スペルミスに注意。"}, {"incorrect":"✗ This plastic is derive from oil.","correct":"✓ This plastic is derived from oil.","note":"受動態の形に注意。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The company is trying to reduce its reliance on oil-derived materials.","translation":"その会社は石油由来の材料への依存を減らそうとしています。","type":"general"},{"sentence":"Oil-derived fertilizers have boosted agricultural yields for decades.","translation":"石油由来の肥料は何十年にもわたって農業生産量を押し上げてきました。","type":"specific"},{"sentence":"The environmental impact of oil-derived products is a major concern.","translation":"石油由来の製品の環境への影響は大きな懸念事項です。","type":"general"}]}
